casebody.data:
Berkley E. HAIRSTON
v.
Butch JACKSON, Superintendent-Nash Correctional; Theodis Beck, Secretary of N.C. Dept. of Corrections; State of North Carolina. No. 199P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 26, 2008. Berkley E. Hairston, Pro Se. Robert Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of NC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Plaintiff on the 23rd day of April 2008 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 26th day of August 2008."
